Title: Homecoming
Plot: Events in this episode take place on the day of Claire's Homecoming game. Claire's father is growing desperate to stop the villain who is coming after Claire. Nathan gets the painting from Linderman, and is horrified by what it depicts. Mohinder's dreams hold secrets about his father. Ando waits for Hiro who still has not returned from the past. Peter must try to save the cheerleader and also himself.
GuestStars: Shishir Kurup, Sakina Jaffrey, Jayma Mays, Erick Avari, Clay Wilcox, Karl T. Wright, Tiffany Hines, Brent Tarnol, Danielle Morrow, Sally Champlin, Josh Clark, Ryan K. Smith, Ossie Mair, Alan John Evrard
